original_title: Sri Lanka’s shares down in mid day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka‘s shares edged down in mid day trade on Monday, data from the Colombo Stock Exchange showed.
The main All Share Price Index was down by 0.87 percent or 75.71 points to 8,621.36, while the most liquid index S&P SL20 was down 0.93 percent or 22.99 points to 2,457.77
Top losers were Sampath Bank, Commercial Bank and Expolanka as at 1200 hours. (Colombo/May29/2023)
